videos.description: Louisville's Deng Adel drives and finds Anas Mahmoud with a lob at the rim early vs. No. 1 Virginia.
videos.headline: Mahmoud rises up for an alley-oop

videos.description: Quentin Snider sinks back-to-back three-pointers to add to Louisville's 13-0 run.
videos.headline: Snider adds to Cardinals' 13-0 run

videos.description: Virginia's Isaiah Wilkins shows off his hops with a major rim defense on Deng Adel.
videos.headline: Wilkins flies high for block in final seconds of 1st half

videos.description: After Louisville's Deng Adel turns the ball over on an inbounds pass with 0.9 seconds left, De'Andre Hunter drills a 3 as time expires to give Virginia a 67-66 win.
videos.headline: Virginia beats Louisville at the buzzer
